content.description: Sit start with a left hand undercling and a right hand sidepull. From there, gain a right hand pinch with a perfect hole for the thumb on the arete, bump it further up to a better sidepull, bring along the feet, reach the lip, traverse left to the boulder's apex, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well.
content.location: It climbs the vertical fracture at the center of Animals' north face.

content.description:
Let It Build You climbs an overhanging arete on solid rock over a poor landing.

Sit start with a left hand sloper-bump and a right hand sidepull edge. From there, pull to a great left hand edge, follow to a right hand gaston, paste a left foot, bump the left hand below the right hand, gain a thin right hand edge, then move to a decent edge and match on it, follow to the lip, and mantel atop the boulder from the north face.
content.protection: At least a pair of pads. The landing has a rock throughout most of where the problem climbs.
content.location: It climbs the northeast arete of Animals.
